short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visit any page, share it on Heavybuzz with 1 click, then get rewarded for making it buzz!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Members of Heavybuzz.com should install this addon to make sharing faster and easier. Once installed to your browser, you can post any web page you are visiting, to your Heavybuzz account and share it on your favorite social network with 1 click.
